mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, username, password, phone_number, email, created_at, basic_address, userrank, user_role) values(#{user_id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone_number}, #{email}, NOW(), #{basic_address}, #{userrank}, #{user_role})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET warned_user = #{warned_user}, warn_start_at = NOW(), warn_end_at = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), warn_cause = #{warn_cause} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
UPDATE users SET warned_user = NULL, warn_start_at = NULL, warn_end_at = NULL, warn_cause = NULL WHERE warn_end_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE username LIKE #{keyword} OR basic_address LIKE #{keyword}
